name: Emock
description:
Save the Emoks! Their planet is dying so help them migrate to a new One!

You'll be playing 8BiBi (their new God) to feed them during the journey. They'll live their life (hopefully) until the destination is reached.

How to play? Grab the right fruits to put them into the right slots.

On the keyboard:

  •  'Q' 8BiBigoes to the left 
  •  'D' 8BiBigoes to the right
  •  'Z' 8BiBi jumps
